subject: I'm
selfIntroduction: Front-End Developer who likes to build web app through clean UI and optimized performance. I uses React ecosystem to build things. Life-long learner and loves to collaborate with others.

list.name: Kelpin Hartanto
list.text: Working with Ilham is a breeze. He deeply understands how frontend apps consume our services, anticipating issues and delivering intuitive UIs from complex data.

list.name: Steve Manumpil
list.text: Ilham builds more than UIs; he builds a cohesive system with the backend in mind. His thoughtful approach to data flow makes our joint development incredibly smooth.

list.name: Ilyas Adiyasa
list.text: Ilham is an amazing teammate. His code is top-notch â€“ clean, readable, and adheres to best practices. He's always sharing knowledge and elevating our team.

list.name: Leonardo Kurniawan
list.text: Collaborating with Ilham is rewarding. He brings creativity and technical precision, tackling complex UI challenges with elegant solutions. A great team player.

list.name: [QA Tester Name]
list.text: Testing Ilham's work is easy. His attention to detail means fewer bugs and smoother testing cycles. He delivers stable, responsive UIs and quickly addresses feedback.

list.name: [QA Tester Name]
list.text: Ilham's builds are always high quality. I rarely find critical issues, thanks to his understanding of edge cases and accessibility. He aims for a polished product.

list.name: [QA Tester Name]
list.text: I appreciate Ilham's thoroughness. He's proactive in his own testing, often catching issues before they reach us. His clear communication streamlines our process.

list.name: Rinaldi Safrizal
list.text: Ilham is highly communicative and collaborative. He provides clear updates, identifies roadblocks, and offers creative solutions. He translates requirements into engaging UIs seamlessly.
